April
Fir at
19 4 0
Mr. M. 3. Novik
Radio Station WYNC
Municipal Broadcasting System
New York City
Dear Novik:
I am enclosing a copy of another letter
received from one of the Commissioners
regarding the application to re-broadcast
WRUL programs.
Cordially yours,
Frank E. Sohooley
FES/rep
